features for a Java customer website application using Stripes and Spring Framework Assisted with management of deployments into a multitier environment using Jenkins 1 Worked with Performance Engineering team to analyze code and determine improvements that could be made for improved customer experience and resource utilization Wrote a proof of concept that implemented Spring Async annotations to improve login time during data prefetch operations Login times improved 50 which allowed for expansion of data prefetch abilities which the business team took advantage of to provide features in an existing system from start to finish utilizing Struts 10 JMock 2 StrutsTestCase Oracle SVN Eclipse and YUI with an Agile development process in the existing architecture On call problem
